com.oracle.tools.runtime.java.virtualization
Class VirtualizedMBeanServerBuilder

java.lang.Object
  javax.management.MBeanServerBuilder
      com.oracle.tools.runtime.java.virtualization.VirtualizedMBeanServerBuilder

public class VirtualizedMBeanServerBuilder
extends MBeanServerBuilder

A VirtualizedMBeanServerBuilder is an MBeanServerBuilder that isolates MBeanServers with in a VirtualizedSystem.

Additionally, a VirtualizedMBeanServerBuilder automatically manages the creation of JMXConnectorServers when remote JMX has been enabled.

Copyright (c) 2011. All Rights Reserved. Oracle Corporation.
Oracle is a registered trademark of Oracle Corporation and/or its affiliates.

Author:
Brian Oliver, Jonathan Knight
